title: Barcelona 2 seater Bench
body: Mies Van der Rohe managed to rose from the ashes in the year that saw the end of the roaring twenties and the Wall Street crash and introduced modern creations that were undoubtedly ahead of their time one of his iconic masterpiece is the Barcelona 2 Seater Bench that was originally designed in 1929, it has become an essential piece of the iconic Barcelona range. It got its name due to its cross-shaped structure in flat polished chrome steel. This gorgeous bench is perfect for couples, friends, and colleges, as it seats two people.
